title: LF DUO RANK PARTNER [i am smurfing]
body:
LF for a smurf duo partner for my gold account

Add me in game: CFO

replies.body:
would you duo with a silver 3 with tunnel vision to get to gold? I've been playing this game for many years and im cracking down on my rank rn. I main rumble top and looking for someone of a higher level to duo with or help me get better so I can get to gold. I see you're apex level and this is not a request to be carried x)

{{champion:68}}
